about_the_game:
AlibAi is a thrilling, AI-driven murder mystery game where you, the player, take on the role of a clever imposter hidden among a group of NPCs. As suspicions rise and alibis are tested, your goal is simple but intense: deceive, mislead, and outwit the AI characters to survive. As each day unfolds, you navigate tense conversations, select night-time targets, and attempt to frame others—all while concealing your role as the true killer.

Blending a murder-mystery setup with the cunning mechanics of a social deduction game, AlibAi challenges you to manipulate the story and dodge accusations. Think you're clever enough to convince AI-driven NPCs that someone else is to blame?

Key Features:

  • Unique Murder Mystery Gameplay
    Make strategic choices in night-time actions and morning conversations to shift suspicion onto others and avoid getting caught.

  • Immersive AI-Driven Conversations
    Interact with advanced AI NPCs, each with unique personalities, alibis, and motivations, who adapt and respond based on your actions.

  • Dynamic Social Deduction
    Each round, try to deduce what the other characters are thinking, manipulate their trust, and use misdirection to guide the blame away from you.

  • Strategic Room Selection and Night-time Actions
    Move between rooms with intent; each night offers a new opportunity to corner a target or shift suspicion elsewhere.

  • Narrative Twists and Unexpected AI Reactions
    The AI characters may have unique suspicions or even provide information that’s partially true yet damaging to your plan, keeping gameplay unpredictable.

Prepare for a challenging journey as you bluff, mislead, and survive in this single-player game of deception and deduction. AlibAi combines clean, pixel art-inspired environments with a sleek UI and sound design meant to pull players into an intense atmosphere of secrecy and suspicion.

Make the wrong move, and the NPCs may start to doubt you. Plan your actions wisely, and you might just walk away with the ultimate alibi.
